DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effectiveness approach combine massage therapy element neurocognitive rehabilitation motor imagery word physiotherapist compare traditional massage therapy reduce pain patient chronic low back pain ( CLBP ) evaluate pain reduction link interoceptive awareness patient 's ability relax measurement hearth rate variability ( HRV ) .
DOC.brief_title: Myofascial Massage Treatment Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Presence chronic nonspecific low back pain least three month Subjects age 18 50 year Presence acute low back pain Low back pain due cause ( vertebral fracture , spondylolisthesis , herniated disc , lumbar canal stenosis ) Disorders central and/or peripheral nervous system Systemic inflammatory disease ( eg rheumatoid arthritis ) Systemic infectious disease Neoplastic disease Previous Surgery Cognitive impairment Pregnancy
